page.title: 06THE CHURCH IN WOOLMER GREEN
page.content: {Woolmer Green Church}is 85 years old, it is called St Michael and All Angels Father Robin is the priest. The church is small and only holds eighty people. It has an arched roof and is made of brick with a bell outside,it has got three stained glass windows behind the altar. Over the front of the main door there is a picture of St George and the dragon. Inside the church there is an organ and a piano but there are no brasses on the floor. There is a grave yard which is still used with four hundred and twenty graves in it. St Michaels is in Welwyn Parish together with St Marys and St Peters.
